question: Who launches project to develop the poorest ward in Mumbai?
explanation: Former Indian cricketer Sachin Tendulkar on Tuesday launched Mission-24 a programme aimed at improving the quality of life in one of Mumbai's poorest wards through collaborative efforts in the next 24 months. The main aim of the program to provide basic amenities to residents of M-East ward that includes slums of Shivaji Nagar, Deonar and Mankhurd.
